languages.text: "Когда вступил в должность и стал разбираться в... особенностях отсека, то узнал про этот стих и как бы его изучал. Расспрашивал о нем тех, кто принадлежит пастве Кровавой паутины, хотел понять, нет ли в нем чего крамольного — так и запомнил слова". {n}Капитан морщит лоб.{/n} "Странный стих, но вроде ничего такого в нем нет".

traits.locale_text: "Когда вступил в должность и стал разбираться в... особенностях отсека, то узнал про этот стих и как бы его изучал. Расспрашивал о нем тех, кто принадлежит пастве Кровавой паутины, хотел понять, нет ли в нем чего крамольного — так и запомнил слова". {n}Капитан морщит лоб.{/n} "Странный стих, но вроде ничего такого в нем нет".

languages.text: "When I took up my post here, I made sure to familiarise myself with all the... particular qualities of this compartment. I soon heard about the verse and decided to investigate. I questioned a number of people who follow the Bloodspun Web as I was trying to figure out if there was anything pernicious about it, and eventually I learned the whole thing." {n}He frowns.{/n} "The words are certainly strange, but it's nothing worse than that, it seems."

languages.text: « Quand j'ai pris mes fonctions ici, je me suis fait un devoir de me familiariser avec toutes les... particularités propres à ce compartiment. J'ai très vite entendu parler de cette prière et j'ai décidé de mener l'enquête. À force d'interroger les adeptes de la Toile de Sang pour savoir s'il fallait y voir un quelconque danger, j'en suis arrivé à la connaître sur le bout des doigts. » {n}Il fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, si sa teneur peut paraître étrange, ce n'est jamais qu'une litanie inoffensive, semble-t-il. »
languages.original_text: "When I took up my post here, I made sure to familiarise myself with all the... particular qualities of this compartment. I soon heard about the verse and decided to investigate. I questioned a number of people who follow the Bloodspun Web as I was trying to figure out if there was anything pernicious about it, and eventually I learned the whole thing." {n}He frowns.{/n} "The words are certainly strange, but it's nothing worse than that, it seems."

traits.locale_text: « Quand j'ai pris mes fonctions ici, je me suis fait un devoir de me familiariser avec toutes les... particularités propres à ce compartiment. J'ai très vite entendu parler de cette prière et j'ai décidé de mener l'enquête. À force d'interroger les adeptes de la Toile de Sang pour savoir s'il fallait y voir un quelconque danger, j'en suis arrivé à la connaître sur le bout des doigts. » {n}Il fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, si sa teneur peut paraître étrange, ce n'est jamais qu'une litanie inoffensive, semble-t-il. »

languages.text: «Cuando asumí este cargo, me aseguré de familiarizarme con todas las... particularidades de este compartimento. No tardé en enterarme de los versos y me puse a investigar. Interrogué a varios seguidores de la Red Sanguinolenta para averiguar si había algo pernicioso con todo esto y acabé enterándome de todo». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Es cierto que son palabras extrañas, pero no parecen traer mayor peligro».
languages.original_text: "When I took up my post here, I made sure to familiarise myself with all the... particular qualities of this compartment. I soon heard about the verse and decided to investigate. I questioned a number of people who follow the Bloodspun Web as I was trying to figure out if there was anything pernicious about it, and eventually I learned the whole thing." {n}He frowns.{/n} "The words are certainly strange, but it's nothing worse than that, it seems."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando asumí este cargo, me aseguré de familiarizarme con todas las... particularidades de este compartimento. No tardé en enterarme de los versos y me puse a investigar. Interrogué a varios seguidores de la Red Sanguinolenta para averiguar si había algo pernicioso con todo esto y acabé enterándome de todo». {n}Frunce el ceño.{/n} «Es cierto que son palabras extrañas, pero no parecen traer mayor peligro».

languages.text: 「私がここに赴任したとき、この区のすべての…特異な特質を熟知するように努めました。すぐにこの詩のことを聞き、調査することにしました。 ブラッドスパン・ウェブに何か悪質なものがあるのかどうか、ブラッドスパン・ウェブを信仰する何人かに質問してみました。最終的にはその全体を知ることになりました」{n}彼は眉をひそめた。{/n}「言葉は確かに奇妙ですが、それ以上のものではないようです」
languages.original_text: "When I took up my post here, I made sure to familiarise myself with all the... particular qualities of this compartment. I soon heard about the verse and decided to investigate. I questioned a number of people who follow the Bloodspun Web as I was trying to figure out if there was anything pernicious about it, and eventually I learned the whole thing." {n}He frowns.{/n} "The words are certainly strange, but it's nothing worse than that, it seems."

traits.locale_text: 「私がここに赴任したとき、この区のすべての…特異な特質を熟知するように努めました。すぐにこの詩のことを聞き、調査することにしました。 ブラッドスパン・ウェブに何か悪質なものがあるのかどうか、ブラッドスパン・ウェブを信仰する何人かに質問してみました。最終的にはその全体を知ることになりました」{n}彼は眉をひそめた。{/n}「言葉は確かに奇妙ですが、それ以上のものではないようです」

languages.text: “我刚来这里上任的时候，就下决心要了解这片区域的所有……特殊情况。没过多久，我就听说了他们的祷词，打算调查一下。我想弄清楚织血罗网教派究竟会不会危害这片甲板的安全，于是我找了一部分信徒问话，最终弄清了这些事情的来龙去脉。”{n}他皱起了眉头。{/n}“他们的祷词确实非常古怪，但好像也没什么别的影响。”
languages.original_text: "When I took up my post here, I made sure to familiarise myself with all the... particular qualities of this compartment. I soon heard about the verse and decided to investigate. I questioned a number of people who follow the Bloodspun Web as I was trying to figure out if there was anything pernicious about it, and eventually I learned the whole thing." {n}He frowns.{/n} "The words are certainly strange, but it's nothing worse than that, it seems."

traits.locale_text: “我刚来这里上任的时候，就下决心要了解这片区域的所有……特殊情况。没过多久，我就听说了他们的祷词，打算调查一下。我想弄清楚织血罗网教派究竟会不会危害这片甲板的安全，于是我找了一部分信徒问话，最终弄清了这些事情的来龙去脉。”{n}他皱起了眉头。{/n}“他们的祷词确实非常古怪，但好像也没什么别的影响。”

languages.text: "Als ich meinen Posten hier antrat, habe ich mich mit allen ... Besonderheiten dieses Moduls vertraut gemacht. Als ich von dem Vers hörte, beschloss ich, der Sache nachzugehen. Ich habe einige Anhänger des Blutgesponnenen Netzes befragt, weil ich herausfinden wollte, ob es in irgendeiner Weise schädlich ist, und schließlich erfuhr ich die ganze Wahrheit." {n}Er runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Die Worte sind zwar seltsam, aber das war's offenbar auch schon."
languages.original_text: "When I took up my post here, I made sure to familiarise myself with all the... particular qualities of this compartment. I soon heard about the verse and decided to investigate. I questioned a number of people who follow the Bloodspun Web as I was trying to figure out if there was anything pernicious about it, and eventually I learned the whole thing." {n}He frowns.{/n} "The words are certainly strange, but it's nothing worse than that, it seems."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich meinen Posten hier antrat, habe ich mich mit allen ... Besonderheiten dieses Moduls vertraut gemacht. Als ich von dem Vers hörte, beschloss ich, der Sache nachzugehen. Ich habe einige Anhänger des Blutgesponnenen Netzes befragt, weil ich herausfinden wollte, ob es in irgendeiner Weise schädlich ist, und schließlich erfuhr ich die ganze Wahrheit." {n}Er runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Die Worte sind zwar seltsam, aber das war's offenbar auch schon."

languages.text: "Burada görev başına geçtiğimde kompartıman bünyesindeki her şeye... Aşina olmayı başardım. Sonrasında mısraların varlığını işittim ve onları soruşturmaya karar verdim. Bu hususta habis bir durum bulunup bulunmadığını çözmeye çalışırken Kanipi Ağı takipçileri arasından birçok kişiyi sorguya çektim. En nihayetinde de tüm hakikati öğrendim." {n}Kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Sözlerin tuhaf olduğu aşikâr. Ancak bundan öte habis bir durum yok gibi görünüyor."
languages.original_text: "When I took up my post here, I made sure to familiarise myself with all the... particular qualities of this compartment. I soon heard about the verse and decided to investigate. I questioned a number of people who follow the Bloodspun Web as I was trying to figure out if there was anything pernicious about it, and eventually I learned the whole thing." {n}He frowns.{/n} "The words are certainly strange, but it's nothing worse than that, it seems."
